name: v1.3.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix error while configuring or scanning a library by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/72


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/compare/v1.3.0...v1.3.1

name: v1.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* feat(platforms): added platform support by @shawly in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/63


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/compare/v1.2.5...v1.3.0

name: v1.2.5
body:
## What's Changed
* [GH-61] Fix manual mapping leading to duplicates in DB by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/62


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/compare/v1.2.4...v1.2.5

name: v1.2.4
body:
## What's Changed
* fix(game-detail): prevent overflow of long company logos by @shawly in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/58
* feat(refresh): added refresh button on game detail view to refresh metadata by @shawly in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/57
* feat(download): add file size calculation for DownloadService by @shawly in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/56
* Improve test coverage by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/60
* Switch CI to SonarCloud by @grimsi 

## New Contributors
* @shawly made their first contribution in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/58

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/compare/v1.2.3...v1.2.4

name: v1.2.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Check OS before hiding internal folder by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/53
* Disable 'optimizeCodegen' in maven profobuf build step by @grimsi
* Update Spring Boot version to 2.7.4 by @grimsi 


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3

name: v1.2.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump protobuf-java from 3.21.3 to 3.21.7 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/32
* Ignore empty folders and hidden files/folders in the library by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/44
* Add CI pipeline by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/47
* Add release steps to CI pipeline by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/48
* Add Docker release to CI by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/51

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/32

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2

name: v1.2.1
body:
New features:

- Gameyfin version is now shown in footer (#22)
- Added docker-compose example file for multiple source folders

Bugfixes:

- Fixed environment variable names in docker-compose example files

name: v1.2.0
body:
New features:

- Ratings are now shown in game detail screen
- Screenshots and Video grid in game detail screen are now responsive
- a bit of general UI polishing
- Gameyfin now shows detailed scan results in the Web UI after a scan has been completed

Bugfixes:

- "gameyfin.cache" and "gameyfin.db" parameters are now correctly set if the user overwrites them

name: v1.1.3
body:
Bugfixes:

- Fix crash when trying to determine size of single file (instead of directories)

name: v1.1.2
body:
Bugfixes:

- Fixed duplicate game handling (#16) 
- Corrupted images will now be re-downloaded from IGDB servers while performing a library scan (although they may still be cached in the browser, clearing the cache manually should fix it)

name: v1.1.1
body:
New features:

- The chips in the game detail view are now clickable
- Filters are now expanded if they are active at page load

Bugfixes:

- Fixed filters loading twice and preventing the user from navigating back
- Fixed some minor layout issues on smaller screen sizes

name: v1.1.0
body:
New features:

- Implemented support for multiple library folders (#10)
- Implemented improved sorting and filtering for the Web UI (#11)

name: v1.0.1
body:
New features:
- "spring.config.name" can now be ommited from the startup command
- Added favicon and logo
- Max req/s and concurrent requests to the IGDB API are now configurable

Bugfixes:
- Downloads aborted by clients will no longer log a stack trace, but a nice informative message
